Translation.String: Converts Plop the Growables plopped building level-locking settings to Advanced Building Level Control settings
Please refer to the mod's Steam Workshop page for further information.
An active instance of the Plop the Growables mod was detected.
PtG converter is not able to read data saved by Plop the Growables if the original mod is still operating.
Please exit the game, unsubscribe from Plop the Growables, and restart the game to try again.
PtG converter was not able to properly read data saved by Plop the Growables. It is possible that your savegame data has been corrupted.
This means that the mod is not able to operate, and has shut down.
PtG Converter was unable to complete its required Harmony patches.
Possible causes of this problem include:
The required Harmony 2 mod dependency was not installed
An old and/or broken mod is preventing Harmony 2 from operating properly
